name: ALIEN ESCAPE!
description:
• 18 Levels;
  • 2 Bosses;
  • 4 Musics;
  • A Cute Alien.
Controls
  • A = Left;
  • D = Right;
  • Space = Jump;
  • Mouse Left Button = Control Objects.
Functionalities Objects That Glow Green Can Be Controlled Using Mouse Arrow. (You can't control two objects at the same time and you can't even place objects on the wall. And you can't move if you're controlling some object).
